institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 25 (Occupational Council Function)
contents: Article 25 (Functions of the Occupation Council) ① The Occupation Council may perform the following functions for the development of skill competition competitions: 1. Presenting opinions related to the establishment and revision of job descriptions, 2. Preparing criteria for submitting assignments for skill competition tasks Presentation of opinions related to, 3. Presentation of opinions related to the execution method and review procedure of skill competitions, 4. Presentation of opinions and proposals for new occupations in related fields, 5. Technical education training for instructors, etc. to foster athletes in the relevant occupations, 6. Holding workshops and seminars for the development of the relevant occupation, 7. Announcement of important information such as special matters for the relevant occupation on the skills competition website, ② The Chairman of the Korean Committee may have Korean Committee employees participate in registered council meetings.
